name: colorcli_bone_crawler
summary: ./dreamsim.exe "An oil painting portrays a coastal scene with three fishing b...

messages.message: ./dreamsim.exe "An oil painting portrays a coastal scene with three fishing boats pulled up on a sandy beach. The boats are painted in faded red and blue colors, with visible weathering on their hulls. In the background, white-capped waves break against dark rocks. The lighting suggests overcast conditions with diffused illumination across the entire scene."

./dreamsim.exe "An open white book displays a collage on its right-hand page against a light background. In the upper left, a partially clothed figure in fishnet attire sits in a metal chair. To the right, a silver-toned robotic figure is posed with arms raised and knees bent. Below and partially to the right is a dark, skeletal, quadrupedal creature with an elongated tail. The figures are placed on a white surface, while a dark gray, geometrically patterned background appears underneath the lower figure. The lighting is diffused and even across the image." --mode calligram

./dreamsim.exe "An open white book displays a collage on its right-hand page against a light background. In the upper left, a partially clothed figure in fishnet attire sits in a metal chair. To the right, a silver-toned robotic figure is posed with arms raised and knees bent. Below and partially to the right is a dark, skeletal, quadrupedal creature with an elongated tail. The figures are placed on a white surface, while a dark gray, geometrically patterned background appears underneath the lower figure. The lighting is diffused and even across the image." --text MINIMAL

./dreamsim.exe "An open white book displays a collage on its right-hand page against a light background. In the upper left, a partially clothed figure in fishnet attire sits in a metal chair. To the right, a silver-toned robotic figure is posed with arms raised and knees bent. Below and partially to the right is a dark, skeletal, quadrupedal creature with an elongated tail. The figures are placed on a white surface, while a dark gray, geometrically patterned background appears underneath the lower figure. The lighting is diffused and even across the image." --text NONE --spinners maximal
